hackathon-description-text: Hacking Generation Y promotes youth entrepreneurship by bringing the most brilliant and creative minds together through collaborative learning. Starting first in Silicon Valley, January 2015, and later in Israel, Jamaica and India. HackGenY plans to go global by providing those dedicated and passionate the tools to organize a 36 hour hackathon for over 1,000 youth under the age of 26.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Awarded to the best 3D application developed at the hackathon
1 month of PR by Publicize + 5 pebble watches + 3doodler pen
1 month of PR by Publicize + Estimote

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1 Fore St, London EC2Y 5EJ, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How good well was the idea implemented?
How well does the project look like? How well did they present it? How interesting the pitch was?
Does it look like the team worked well? Everybody was involved?
How original is the idea? Does it looks like something you didn't see before?

hackathon-description-header: Bringing together the most talented 16-25 years old developers, designers and entrepreneurs to one, big, Hackathon!
